item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my new blog! Isn’t this exciting that I am finally starting to write in one? This is the blog section for my main portfolio page, Main Page. I love that page so much and I really think you should check it out if you haven’t. I followed a Brutalist Design for it. What will this blog contain you may be asking yourself as you read this on a screen, maybe a small phone screen or even a larger monitor.
